title: Opinion: Medicaid work requirements will particularly hurt unpaid caregivers
description: Big, impending changes to Medicaid will quietly but profoundly decimate the unpaid workforce that already props up our long-term care system.
content: Big, impending changes to Medicaid will quietly but profoundly decimate the unpaid workforce that already props up our long-term care system.
